title: Please Ban These trolls.
body:
Lets all get these people banned, people who troll in champ select and ruin the game for everyone.
Post ur pics and lets hope riot reads this and bans these low lifes.


And now i'm stuck in a game with him.. 3rd lobby i got him in, in a row..

replies.body:
You could try, you know, not queuing for a bit, so you don't get matched with him. In addition to standard reporting.

And name+shame is not permitted on the boards.

Please use the board's ability to attach images next time.
